headline: Veteran analysts drop shock call on Micron stock after historic run
summary: Micron Technology (MU) is the definition of a “crowded winner.” This kind of bullishness is rare. Targets cannot keep up. Instead, it looks like even bullish price targets cannot keep up; they’re chasing the tape. Shares were recently changing hands for $382.89 (Feb. 6, 2026), off their $455.50 ...

headline: Micron’s Nvidia HBM4 Setback And US$24b Singapore Bet On AI Memory
summary: Reports indicate Micron Technology (NasdaqGS:MU) is not expected to be part of Nvidia's supplier list for next generation HBM4 due to performance limitations. The company has announced plans for a new wafer fabrication facility in Singapore with investment of about US$24b. The Singapore plant is intended to increase output of advanced NAND and HBM memory aimed at AI related workloads. Micron is a major producer of DRAM, NAND and high bandwidth memory used in data centers, smartphones and...
